item.description:
Get ready for summer and bathing suit season with a 1 hour bootcamp fitness class! 

We'll be using resistance & strength training to work out legs, arms, gluts and core as well as some flexibility and cardio training. This is a full body workout packed into 1 hour!

$10 drop in rate. (exact cash please)

AMA Personal Training/Fitness Studio

1285 Washington Street

East Weymouth, MA

This is only available for 4 weeks!!  Reserve your spot now!!

April 21st, April 28th, May 5th and May 12th

OR sign up for the full 4 weeks at a discounted rate.
item.how_to_find_us: Park in back and the door for the studio will be open

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: BOOTCAMP!!
